trans-unit.source: The base class from which HTTP modules that are configurable with the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) derive.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
Releases the resources (except memory) used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
Override this method in your derived class to release resources.
The default implementation is empty.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
Initializes the HTTP module.

This method implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by initializing the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method, and then invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.

Derived classes override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> methods.
The application object which contains this module.
When overridden in a derived class, initializes the current module and prepares it to handle events from its ASP.NET application object.
Use the InitializeModule method to load any additional configuration state as well as to register event handling methods with specific events raised by the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object.

When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property should be used for all token processing in this module.
The application object which contains this module.

When overridden in a derived class, initializes module properties based on values in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for it.

When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
